channel.title: Quests
channel.description:
could someone help me make a simple and very easy quest please.
all i want is when u press the quest it comes up with a menu to read about it
and for the quest just to talk to a few npcs to get a reward...
i am asking for this noob quest because 1. im new to coding. 2. never coded a quest before.
so hopefully this will kick start my quest making..
tyvm for your help
